org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender

Interface DeclarationHandle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDeclaration, DefaultExtensionDeclaration, DefaultInstanceDeclaration, DefaultTypeDeclaration

    public interface DeclarationHandle
    Handle on the associated Declaration service. It can be used to start and/or stop the underlying declaration as well as retrieving its status (bound or not).
    Since:
    1.11.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status getStatus()
      Return the current (instant) status of the declaration.
      void publish()
      Publish the Declaration.
      void retract()
      Retract the Declaration service.

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        void publish()
        Publish the Declaration. If the declaration is already registered, it's a no-op operation.

      • retract

        void retract()
        Retract the Declaration service. If the declaration is not registered, it's a no-op operation.

      • getStatus

        Status getStatus()
        Return the current (instant) status of the declaration. Remember that Status is immutable (status does not change over time). If you want an updated status, call again the getStatus() method.
        Returns:
        the instant status of the Declaration
